original: @35b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal rlo //🔽klu chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgru @36a * //
analyzed: @35b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal rlo // klu chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgru @36a * //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajramahābala.

original: pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par me tog sngon po la sogs pa sa 'phags pa rnams mngon par mchod nas sa'i cho ga la sogs pa rnams sngon du song nas /
analyzed: pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par me tog sngon po la sogs pa sa 'phags pa rnams mngon par mchod nas sa'i cho ga la sogs pa rnams sngon du song nas /
translated: The practitioner who wishes to confer empowerment into the maṇḍala of the eight great nāgas should have pure samaya. Having made offerings to the superior ones with blue flowers and so on in a pleasing place, having performed the site ritual, and so on,

original: sa stegs gru gsum legs par byas la cho ga bzhin du thig legs par btab la /
analyzed: sa stegs gru gsum legs par byas la cho ga bzhin du thig legs par btab la /
translated: make a good triangular platform. Having laid out the maṇḍala according to the rite,

original: de nas chon btang ste /
analyzed: de nas chon btang ste /
translated: then set out the ropes.

original: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar po lte ba sngon po /
analyzed: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar po lte ba sngon po /
translated: Draw an eight-petaled white lotus with a blue center,

original: mu khyud sna tshogs padma'i phreng ba khyams dmar po sgo bzhi rigs dang 'dra ba /
analyzed: mu khyud sna tshogs padma'i phreng ba khyams dmar po sgo bzhi rigs dang 'dra ba /
translated: a multicolored garland of lotuses, a red courtyard, and four gates in the same family.

original: phyi'i mu khyud sbrul 'bar ba rab tu 'khyil pas 'khor bar bris la /
analyzed: phyi'i mu khyud sbrul 'bar ba rab tu 'khyil pas 'khor bar bris la /
translated: Outside the enclosure, draw a blazing snake coiled in a circle.

original: bum pa brgyad gtso bo'i bum pa dang dgu la so so'i mtshan ma bris la /
analyzed: bum pa brgyad gtso bo'i bum pa dang dgu la so so'i mtshan ma bris la /
translated: Draw the individual signs on the eight vases and the principal vase, making nine.

original: rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa gzhag go //
analyzed: rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa gzhag go //
translated: They are adorned with various ornaments.

original: de nas mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pa dang / klu gtor la sogs pa yang bsham mo //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pa dang / klu gtor la sogs pa yang bsham mo //
translated: Then, arrange whatever offering articles are available and the bali offering for the nagas, and so forth.🔽Having arranged it like that, gather the accumulations in the sky in front of the representation of the merit field.

original: de ltar bshams la tshogs sogs pa'i rten nam mkha' la sbrul la tshogs bsag / de nas so so'i mtshan ma dang ldan pas bum pa'i nang du gtso bo snga ma dang 'dra bar bskyed /
analyzed: de ltar bshams la tshogs sogs pa'i rten nam mkha' la sbrul la tshogs bsag / de nas so so'i mtshan ma dang ldan pas bum pa'i nang du gtso bo snga ma dang 'dra bar bskyed /
translated: Then, with the characteristics of each, generate the principal one as before inside the vase.

original: 'khor gyi klu rnams ni lag pa rnams sbrul mgo gdengs pa ltar byas la /
analyzed: 'khor gyi klu rnams ni lag pa rnams sbrul mgo gdengs pa ltar byas la /
translated: The retinue nagas are made with the hands in the gesture of cobra hood.🔽Recite oṃ pūṃ svāhā.

original: aom phu: sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas mtha' yas mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa smad sprul du 'khyil ba dbu la rin po che dang sprul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka yod pa /
analyzed: aom phu: sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas mtha' yas mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa smad sprul du 'khyil ba dbu la rin po che dang sprul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka yod pa /
translated: Akṣobhya is generated as yellow Ananta with one face and two hands, the lower body coiled like a snake, with a jewel and the hood of seven snake heads on the head,

original: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with all precious ornaments,

original: g-yas zhags pa g-yon padma bsnams pa bskyed do //
analyzed: g-yas zhags pa g-yon padma bsnams pa bskyed do //
translated: holding a noose in the right hand and a lotus in the left hand.

original: de dag kyang gdan padma'i sdong po'i steng na nyi ma dang zla ba'i steng du bskyed do //
analyzed: de dag kyang gdan padma'i sdong po'i steng na nyi ma dang zla ba'i steng du bskyed do //
translated: Also, they are generated on the sun and moon on the lotus stems of their seats.

original: phyag rgya snga ma dang 'dra ba la lho phyogs su aom ba sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas 'jog po mdog dkar po g-yas zhags pa g-yon padma thogs pa snga ma dang 'dra ba bskyed do //🔽nub tu aom bhr'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas ka rko ta dmar po phyag mtshan snga ma dang 'dra ba bskyed do //
analyzed: phyag rgya snga ma dang 'dra ba la lho phyogs su aom ba sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas 'jog po mdog dkar po g-yas zhags pa g-yon padma thogs pa snga ma dang 'dra ba bskyed do // nub tu aom bhr'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas ka rko ta dmar po phyag mtshan snga ma dang 'dra ba bskyed do //
translated: The mudra is the same as before. By reciting Oṃ vaṃ svāhā, white Takṣaka is generated in the south, holding a noose in the right hand and a lotus in the left hand, as before.🔽By reciting Oṃ bhrūṃ svāhā, red Kāliya is generated in the west, holding the same implements as before.

original: byang du aom pha sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas au li ka mdog dmar skya snga ma dang 'dra ba bskyed do //
analyzed: byang du aom pha sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas au li ka mdog dmar skya snga ma dang 'dra ba bskyed do //
translated: By reciting Oṃ phaṃ svāhā, pale red Kulika is generated in the north, holding the same implements as before.

original: shar lhor aom phi sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas nor rgyas mdog ser skya snga ma bzhin du bskyed do //
analyzed: shar lhor aom phi sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas nor rgyas mdog ser skya snga ma bzhin du bskyed do //
translated: By reciting Oṃ piṃ svāhā, pale yellow Vāsuki is generated in the southeast, holding the same implements as before.

original: lho nub tu aom phe sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas dung skyong sngo skya bskyed do //
analyzed: lho nub tu aom phe sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas dung skyong sngo skya bskyed do //
translated: By reciting Oṃ pheṃ svāhā, pale blue Karkkoṭa is generated in the southwest.

original: nub byang du aom pham sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas padma sngo skya bskyed do //
analyzed: nub byang du aom pham sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas padma sngo skya bskyed do //
translated: In the northwest, by reciting “Oṃ phaṃ svāhā,” one generates a pale-red lotus.

original: byang shar du aom phee sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas ba sun mdog dmar sngo snga ma bzhin @36b bskyed do //
analyzed: byang shar du aom phee sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas ba sun mdog dmar sngo snga ma bzhin @36b bskyed do //
translated: In the northeast, by reciting “Oṃ pheṃ svāhā,” one generates a blue-red bāṣpa, as before.

original: de dag kyang sa bon phu las yang dag par 'byung ba rab tu mdzes par bskyed do //
analyzed: de dag kyang sa bon phu las yang dag par 'byung ba rab tu mdzes par bskyed do //
translated: Those are also generated as beautiful, arising from the seed syllable pha.

original: de nas de dag la mchod pa lnga lnga dbul lo //
analyzed: de nas de dag la mchod pa lnga lnga dbul lo //
translated: Then one should offer five offerings to each.🔽Then, one should summon and absorb the individual gnosis beings with jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.🔽The vase water melts into the nature of the nāgas, and one visualizes the water as nectar.

original: de nas so so'i ye shes sems dpa' dza: h'um bam ho: sa dgug gzhug byas la bum chu klu'i ngo bor zhu bas chu bdud rtsir dmigs la so so'i yum gyi mgul nas 'khyud pa'i thugs ka'i yi ge phu: zhes 'od ldan pa la dmigs la snying po
analyzed: de nas so so'i ye shes sems dpa' dza: h'um bam ho: sa dgug gzhug byas la bum chu klu'i ngo bor zhu bas chu bdud rtsir dmigs la so so'i yum gyi mgul nas 'khyud pa'i thugs ka'i yi ge phu: zhes 'od ldan pa la dmigs la snying po
translated: One visualizes the luminous syllable pha in the heart of each one embracing the neck of their individual consort.

original: rgyas bsdus gang mos pa la brgya phrag gcig / klu'i snying po re re la khri phrag bzlas so //
analyzed: rgyas bsdus gang mos pa la brgya phrag gcig / klu'i snying po re re la khri phrag bzlas so //
translated: One should recite the essence mantra one hundred times, whichever one prefers, extensive or concise, and ten thousand times for each of the nāga quintessence mantras.

original: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa re bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa re bya'o //
translated: Then one should perform the offerings and praises.

original: de nas slob ma smyung bar gnas par byas la'o mas gdong bkrus la lag tu klu shing 'bras bu dang bcas pa thogs la dkyil 'khor du bcug la dam tshig dang sdom pa dpog / de nas bum chu bdud rtsi'i ngo bo dang ldan pas dbang bskur ro
analyzed: de nas slob ma smyung bar gnas par byas la'o mas gdong bkrus la lag tu klu shing 'bras bu dang bcas pa thogs la dkyil 'khor du bcug la dam tshig dang sdom pa dpog / de nas bum chu bdud rtsi'i ngo bo dang ldan pas dbang bskur ro
translated: Then, having empowered them with the vase water endowed with the essence of amṛta,

original: // de nas gtor ma btang /
analyzed: // de nas gtor ma btang /
translated: then offer the bali.

original: mandal bsdu / bkra shis gsol lo //
analyzed: mandal bsdu / bkra shis gsol lo //
translated: Collect the maṇḍala, and recite the benediction.

original: klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dug las rgyal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dug las rgyal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The empowerment conferred in the maṇḍala of the eight nāgas, called “Victory over Poison,” composed by Ācārya Dīpaṃkara, is complete.
